title: Create internal/gc package for log cleanup
description: Implement gc.Cleanup(maxAge) that cleans: .tick/activity/activity.jsonl (trim old), .tick/logs/records/*.json (delete old), .tick/logs/runs/*.jsonl (delete old), .tick/logs/checkpoints/*.json (delete old), .tick/logs/context/*.md (delete old). Skip .live.json files. Default 30 days.
closed_reason: Created internal/gc package with Cleaner type that cleans old files from .tick/logs/records, .tick/logs/runs, .tick/logs/checkpoints, .tick/logs/context, and trims .tick/activity/activity.jsonl. Features: configurable max age (default 30 days), dry-run mode, skips .live.json files. 11 comprehensive tests covering all cleanup scenarios.
